snippet: Recent offshore case law has recognized an investor's right to seek a "just and equitable" windup of a hedge fund when it has gone into lockup mode.
abstract: Recent offshore case law has recognized an investor's right to seek a "just and equitable" windup of a hedge fund when it has gone into lockup mode.

byline.original: By JAY EISENHOFER and MATTHEW P. MORRIS

headline.main: Hedge Funds of the Living Dead
